trans-unit.source: Defines an activity-qualified location that corresponds to a user event in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Definierar en aktivitet kvalificerade plats som motsvarar en användarhändelse i potentiella sökvägen för körningen av en arbetsflödesinstans som roten.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen kan inte ärvas.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] An activity designer or a workflow designer may use any of the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to instrument the workflow to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure as a user event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]En Aktivitetsdesigner eller en Arbetsflödesdesignern kan använda någon av de överlagrade <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>och <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoder kan instrumentera arbetsflödet för att generera data till runtime spårning infrastruktur som en användarhändelse.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The data emitted is referred to as user data.
trans-unit.target: Data som sänds kallas användardata.

trans-unit.source: Unlike activity status events, and workflow status events, which occur only on activity or workflow status changes, user events can occur at any location that is instrumented in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Till skillnad från aktiviteten statushändelser och arbetsflöde status för händelser som sker endast på aktivitet eller ändringar av arbetsflödet status, kan användarhändelser ske när som helst instrumenterats i ett arbetsflöde.

trans-unit.source: A UserTrackingLocation defines the matching parameters for such a location by specifying the type of the user data, the type of the activity from which it must be emitted, a collection of conditions that can more precisely qualify an instance or instances of this activity, an optional key name with which the user data must be associated, whether derived types of the user data should be matched, and whether user data emitted from activities derived from the type of the specified activity should be matched.
trans-unit.target: En UserTrackingLocation definierar matchande parametrar för en sådan plats genom att ange typ av användardata, typen för aktiviteten som det måste vara orsakat, en uppsättning villkor som kan mer exakt kvalificera instanser av den här aktiviteten, ett valfritt namn som användardata måste associeras, om härledda typer av informationen som ska matchas , och om användardata orsakat från aktiviteter härledd från typen för den angivna aktiviteten ska matchas.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A single UserTrackingLocation may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En enda UserTrackingLocation kan referera till mer än en faktiska plats i potentiella körning av sökväg för en arbetsflödesinstans.

trans-unit.source: You may add a UserTrackingLocation to either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in order to define the match parameters for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lägga till en UserTrackingLocation <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>för att matcha parametrarna för en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: There are three general conditions which must be met in the following order for the UserTrackingLocation to be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure: the activity that has emitted a user event must match the set of activities specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>; the key, if one exists, associated with the user data must match <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>; and, the type of the user data emitted by the user event must match the set of user data types specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Det finns tre allmänna villkor som måste uppfyllas i följande ordning för UserTrackingLocation ska matchas av spårning körningsinfrastrukturen: aktiviteten som har orsakat en användarhändelse som måste matcha uppsättningen aktiviteter som anges av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>, och <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>; nyckeln om den finns, som är associerade med användaren data måste matcha <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>; och typ av användardata sänds av händelsen användaren måste matcha uppsättningen användardefinierade datatyper som anges av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> , <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only if all three of these conditions are met, does the runtime tracking infrastructure consider the UserTrackingLocation matched.
trans-unit.target: Bara om alla tre av dessa villkor är uppfyllda, betraktar spårning körningsinfrastrukturen UserTrackingLocation matchas.

trans-unit.source: To configure a UserTrackingLocation, you must set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to specify the type of the user data to be matched and either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to specify the type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill konfigurera en UserTrackingLocation, måste du ange antingen <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>att ange typ av användardata som kan matchas och antingen <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>att ange vilken typ av aktivitet som informationen ska skickas som ska matchas.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> to more completely qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lägga till <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>objekt till <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>mer fullständigt kvalificera aktiviteten som användardata måste orsakat.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A> to specify that user data derived from the user data type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> should be matched, and you may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A> to specify that user data emitted from activities derived from the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> should be matched.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ange <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>att ange att användardata härleds från den användardatatypen som anges av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>ska matchas och du kan ange <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>att ange att användardata orsakat från aktiviteter som härletts från aktivitetstypen som anges av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>som ska matchas.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> to specify that only user data associated with the specified key name should be matched for this UserTrackingLocation.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ange <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>för att ange användare och data som är associerade med det angivna namnet för nyckeln ska matchas för den här UserTrackingLocation.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the runtime tracking structure will not try to match the key associated with the user data.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>är en null-referens (`Nothing` i Visual Basic), runtime spårning struktur försöker inte matchar den nyckel som associeras med användardata.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes an empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Standardkonstruktorn initierar en tom <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify both the type of the user data to match and the type of the activity from which it must be emitted in order to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Du måste ange både typ av informationen så att den matchar och vilken typ av aktivitet som den ska skickas för att kunna matchas.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> you must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to specify the type of an activity from which user data must be emitted to be matched, and you must also explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to specify the type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Därför att konfigurera den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>måste du uttryckligen ställa in antingen <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>Om du vill ange vilken typ av en aktivitet som användardata måste vara orsakat som ska matchas och du måste också explicit anger du antingen <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>att ange vilken typ av informationen som ska matchas.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You may further configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan konfigurera ytterligare den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>genom att ange andra egenskaper.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av okvalificerade namnet på den gemensamma language runtime (CLR) typen av användardata.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches user data of the specified type emitted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Den här konstruktorn initierar en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>som matchar användardata för den angivna typen orsakat från arbetsflödet.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched for `argumentTypeName`.
trans-unit.target: Du måste ange icke-kvalificerade namnet på den <xref:System.Type>användardata som ska matchas för `argumentTypeName`.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Du måste uttryckligen ställa in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>i koden konfigureras korrekt <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ytterligare kvalificera den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>genom att ange andra egenskaper.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Okvalificerade namn på CLR-typen för informationen som ska matchas.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> klassen använda vanliga språk CLR (runtime) för användardata.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches user data of the specified type emitted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Den här konstruktorn initierar en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>som matchar användardata för den angivna typen orsakat från arbetsflödet.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Du måste uttryckligen ställa in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>i koden konfigureras korrekt <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ytterligare kvalificera den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>genom att ange andra egenskaper.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>användardata som ska matchas.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av okvalificerade namnet på den gemensamma språk CLR (runtime) typ av användardata och CLR-typen för aktiviteten som användardata måste orsakat okvalificerade namn.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Den här konstruktorn initierar en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>som matchar alla användardata för den angivna typen orsakat från aktiviteter av den angivna typen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the activity and of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Du måste ange icke-kvalificerade namnet på den <xref:System.Type>av aktiviteten och användardata.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "Code".
trans-unit.target: Till exempel icke-kvalificerade namnet på den <xref:System.Type>av en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>aktivitet är "Kod".</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ytterligare kvalificera den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>genom att ange andra egenskaper.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Okvalificerade namn på CLR-typen för informationen som ska matchas.

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Okvalificerade namn på CLR-typen för aktiviteten som informationen ska skickas.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av okvalificerade namnet på den gemensamma språk CLR (runtime) typ av användardata och CLR-typen för aktiviteten som informationen ska skickas.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Den här konstruktorn initierar en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>som matchar alla användardata för den angivna typen orsakat från aktiviteter av den angivna typen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Du måste ange icke-kvalificerade namnet på den <xref:System.Type>av användardata.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ytterligare kvalificera den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>genom att ange andra egenskaper.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Okvalificerade namn på CLR-typen för informationen som ska matchas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>för aktiviteten som användardata måste orsakat.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av typen CLR (runtime) vanliga språk för användardata och icke-kvalificerat namn för CLR-typen för aktiviteten som användardata måste orsakat.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Den här konstruktorn initierar en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>som matchar alla användardata för den angivna typen orsakat från aktiviteter av den angivna typen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Du måste ange icke-kvalificerade namnet på den <xref:System.Type>för aktiviteten.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "Code".
trans-unit.target: Till exempel icke-kvalificerade namnet på den <xref:System.Type>av en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>aktivitet är "Kod".</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ytterligare kvalificera den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>genom att ange andra egenskaper.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>användardata som ska matchas.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Okvalificerade namn på CLR-typen för aktiviteten som informationen ska skickas.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av den vanliga språk CLR (runtime) typ av användardata och CLR-typen för aktiviteten som informationen ska skickas.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Den här konstruktorn initierar en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>som matchar alla användardata för den angivna typen orsakat från aktiviteter av den angivna typen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ytterligare kvalificera den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>genom att ange andra egenskaper.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>användardata som ska matchas.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>för aktiviteten som användardata måste orsakat.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den gemensamma språk CLR (runtime) typen för aktiviteten som användardata måste orsakat för att spåras.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the type of the activity in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill ange vilken typ av aktiviteten på ett sätt som oberoende av versionen Använd <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ActivityType or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Du måste ange antingen ActivityType eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>konfigureras korrekt <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>för aktiviteten som data ska skickas.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger icke-kvalificerade namnet på den gemensamma språk CLR (runtime) typen för aktiviteten som användardata måste orsakat för att spåras.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the type of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Du måste ange icke-kvalificerade namnet på typ av aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify the unqualified name of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity, set ActivityTypeName to "Code".
trans-unit.target: Till exempel för att ange icke-kvalificerade namnet på en <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>aktivitet, ange ActivityTypeName till "Kod".</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: ActivityTypeName provides a much easier way to specify the type of the activity that emits the user data when you author a profile directly in XML.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTypeName ger en mycket enklare sätt att ange vilken typ av aktivitet som skickar informationen när du redigerar en profil direkt i XML.

trans-unit.source: ActivityTypeName also provides a version-independent way of referring to the type of the activity.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTypeName innehåller också ett sätt att oberoende av versionen refererar till typen för aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ActivityTypeName or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Du måste ange ActivityTypeName eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>konfigureras korrekt <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Icke-kvalificerade namnet på den <xref:System.Type>för aktiviteten som data ska skickas.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den gemensamma language runtime (CLR) typen användardata spåras.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the type of the user data in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill ange vilken typ av användardata på ett sätt som oberoende av versionen Använd <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ArgumentType or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Du måste ange antingen ArgumentType eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>konfigureras korrekt <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>användardata spåras.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger okvalificerade namn av typen CLR (runtime) vanliga språk för användardata spåras.

trans-unit.source: ArgumentTypeName provides a much easier way to specify the type of the user data when you author a profile directly in XML.
trans-unit.target: ArgumentTypeName innehåller ett enklare sätt att ange vilken typ av användardata när du redigerar en profil direkt i XML.

trans-unit.source: ArgumentTypeName also provides a version-independent way of referring to the type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: ArgumentTypeName innehåller också ett sätt att oberoende av versionen hänvisar till typ av användardata.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ArgumentTypeName or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Du måste ange ArgumentTypeName eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>konfigureras korrekt <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Icke-kvalificerade namnet på den <xref:System.Type>av användardata.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of conditions that are used to qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en uppsättning villkor som används för att kvalificera aktiviteten som användardata måste orsakat för att spåras.

trans-unit.source: You can use Conditions to more precisely define the instance of the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> from which the user event must be emitted to match the tracking location.
trans-unit.target: Du kan använda villkor för att definiera mer exakt instans för aktivitetstyp som anges av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>från som användaren händelsen måste vara orsakat för att matcha plats för spårning.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to match only <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> equal to "MyCode", you can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to "Code" and add an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> to Conditions that specifies that the ID property of the activity instance must be equal to "MyCode".
trans-unit.target: Om du vill matcha endast exempelvis <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>aktiviteter med en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A>lika med "MyCode", du kan ange <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>till "Kod" och Lägg till en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>till villkor som anger att ID-egenskapen för Aktivitetsinstansen måste vara lika med "MyCode".</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> in Conditions must be true for the activity to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Varje <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>i villkor måste vara true för aktiviteten som ska matchas.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection"></xref> that is used to qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection"> </xref> som används för att kvalificera aktiviteten som informationen ska skickas.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the name with which the user data must be associated for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Hämta eller anger namnet som användardata måste vara associerad med den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> som ska matchas.

trans-unit.source: An activity designer or a workflow designer can use either <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> to associate a string key with the user data that is emitted in a user event.
trans-unit.target: En Aktivitetsdesigner eller en Arbetsflödesdesignern kan använda antingen <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>att associera en string-nyckel med informationen som har genererats i en användarhändelse.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If KeyName is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the key associated with the user data must match the value of KeyName for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Om KeyName inte är en null-referens (`Nothing`), nyckeln som associeras med användardata måste matcha värdet för KeyName för den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>som ska matchas.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: If KeyName is a null reference (`Nothing`), the runtime tracking infrastructure does not check for a matching key to determine whether the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> is matched.
trans-unit.target: Om KeyName är en null-referens (`Nothing`), runtime spårning infrastruktur kontrollerar inte om en motsvarande nyckel att avgöra om den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>matchas.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> key with which the user data must be associated for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> to be matched or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> nyckel som användardata måste vara associerad med den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> som ska matchas eller en null-referens (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user data should be tracked when it is emitted from activities derived from the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName*>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om informationen ska spåras när den har genererats från aktiviteter som härletts från aktivitetstypen som anges av <> </> *> eller <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user data should be tracked when it is emitted from activities derived from the type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName*>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om informationen ska spåras när den har genererats från aktiviteter som härleds från den typen som anges av <> </> *> eller <> </> *>, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The User tracking location is a way to filter user tracked data.
trans-unit.target: Användaren spårning plats är ett sätt att filtrera spåras användardata.

trans-unit.source: The user can filter by the type of the user tracked data by specifying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName*>.
trans-unit.target: Användaren kan filtrera efter typ av användardata spåras genom att ange den <> </> *> eller <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" name="MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> specifies that the user tracked data can be of type ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName or a type derived from the ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName.
trans-unit.target: Ange den <xref uid="langword_csharp_MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" name="MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" href=""> </xref> <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref> värde till <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> anger att spåras informationen kan vara av typen ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName eller en typ härledd från ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if user data derived from the type of the user data specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName*> should be tracked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om användardata härledd från typen användardata som anges av <> </> *> eller <> </> *> ska vara spårade, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
